verses.verse: לְמַחְלְק֖וֹת <WH4256> le-mach-le-Kot Concerning the divisions לְשֹׁעֲרִ֑ים <WH7778> le-sho-'a-Rim; of the porters לַקָּרְחִ֕ים <WH7145> lak-ka-re-Chim Of the Korhites מְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֥הוּ <WH4920> me-she-lem-Ya-hu [was] Meshelemiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son קֹרֵ֖א <WH6981> ko-Re of Kore מִן־ <WH4480> min- at בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the sons אָסָֽף׃ <WH623> 'a-Saf. of Asaph

וְלִמְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֖הוּ <WH4920> ve-lim-she-lem-Ya-hu of Meshelemiah בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> ba-Nim; And the sons זְכַרְיָ֤הוּ <WH2148> ze-char-Ya-hu [were] Zechariah הַבְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> hab-be-chOr the firstborn יְדִֽיעֲאֵ֣ל <WH3043> ye-di-'a-'El Jediael הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, the second זְבַדְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH2069> ze-vad-Ya-hu Zebadiah הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi, the third יַתְנִיאֵ֖ל <WH3496> yat-ni-'El Jathniel הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I. the fourth

עֵילָ֤ם <WH5867> 'ei-Lam Elam הַחֲמִישִׁי֙ <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shi the fifth יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3076> ye-ho-cha-Nan Jehohanan הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <WH8345> hash-shish-Shi, the sixth אֶלְיְהוֹעֵינַ֖י <WH454> el-ye-ho-'ei-Nai Elioenai הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I. the seventh

וּלְעֹבֵ֥ד u-le-'o-Ved אֱדֹ֖ם <WH5654> 'e-Dom of Obededom בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> ba-Nim; Moreover the sons שְׁמַֽעְיָ֤ה <WH8098> she-ma'-Yah [were] Shemaiah הַבְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> hab-be-chOr the firstborn יְהוֹזָבָ֣ד <WH3075> ye-ho-za-Vad Jehozabad הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, the second יוֹאָ֤ח <WH3098> yo-'Ach Joah הַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi the third וְשָׂכָ֣ר <WH7940> ve-sa-Char and Sacar הָרְבִיעִ֔י <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I, the fourth וּנְתַנְאֵ֖ל <WH5417> u-ne-tan-'El and Nethaneel הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shi. the fifth

עַמִּיאֵ֤ל <WH5988> 'am-mi-'El Ammiel הַשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <WH8345> hash-shish-Shi the sixth יִשָׂשכָ֣ר <WH3485> yi-so-sh-Char Issachar הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I, the seventh פְּעֻלְּתַ֖י <WH6469> pe-'ul-le-Tai Peulthai הַשְּׁמִינִ֑י <WH8066> hash-she-mi-Ni; the eighth כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki had indeed בֵרֲכ֖וֹ <WH1288> ve-ra-Cho blessed אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. for God פ Peh

וְלִֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֤ה <WH8098> ve-lish-ma'-Yah Also unto Shemaiah בְנוֹ֙ <WH1121> ve-No his son נוֹלַ֣ד <WH3205> no-Lad born בָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> ba-Nim, were sons הַמִּמְשָׁלִ֖ים <WH4474> ham-mi-sha-Lim that ruled לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit throughout the house אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem; of their father כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for גִבּ֥וֹרֵי <WH1368> gib-Bo-rei for they [were] mighty men חַ֖יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil of valour הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> Hem-mah. like

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons שְׁמַֽעְיָ֗ה <WH8098> she-ma'-Yah, of Shemaiah עָ֠תְנִי <WH6273> 'A-te-ni Othni וּרְפָאֵ֨ל <WH7501> u-re-fa-'El and Rephael וְעוֹבֵ֧ד <WH5744> ve-'o-Ved and Obed אֶלְזָבָ֛ד <WH443> 'el-za-Vad Elzabad אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> 'e-Chav whose brethren בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- men חָ֑יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil; [were] strong אֱלִיה֖וּ <WH453> 'e-li-Hu Elihu וּסְמַכְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH5565> u-se-mach-Ya-hu. and Semachiah

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner אֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these מִבְּנֵ֣י׀ <WH1121> mib-be-Nei All these of the sons עֹבֵ֣ד 'o-Ved אֱדֹ֗ם <WH5654> 'e-Dom, of Obededom הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah they וּבְנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> u-ve-nei-Hem they and their sons וַאֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH251> va-'a-chei-Hem, and their brethren אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- men חַ֥יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil able בַּכֹּ֖חַ <WH3581> bak-Ko-ach for strength לַעֲבֹדָ֑ה <WH5656> la-'a-vo-Dah; for the service שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> shish-Shim [were] threescore וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim and two לְעֹבֵ֥ד le-'o-Ved אֱדֹֽם׃ <WH5654> 'e-Dom. of Obededom

וְלִמְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֗הוּ <WH4920> ve-lim-she-lem-Ya-hu, And Meshelemiah בָּנִ֧ים <WH1121> ba-Nim had sons וְאַחִ֛ים <WH251> ve-'a-Chim and brethren בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- men חָ֖יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil strong שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> she-mo-Nah eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. teen ס sa-Mek

וּלְחֹסָ֥ה <WH2621> u-le-cho-Sah Also Hosah מִן־ <WH4480> min- at בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children מְרָרִ֖י <WH4847> me-ra-Ri of Merari בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> ba-Nim; had sons שִׁמְרִ֤י <WH8113> shim-Ri Simri הָרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> ha-roSh the chief כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ha-Yah was not בְכ֔וֹר <WH1060> ve-Chor, (for [though] he was not the firstborn וַיְשִׂימֵ֥הוּ <WH7760> vay-si-Me-hu made אָבִ֖יהוּ <WH1> 'a-Vi-hu yet his father לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> le-Rosh. the first

חִלְקִיָּ֤הוּ <WH2518> chil-ki-Ya-hu Hilkiah הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <WH8145> hash-she-Ni the second טְבַלְיָ֣הוּ <WH2882> te-val-Ya-hu Tebaliah הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi, the third זְכַרְיָ֖הוּ <WH2148> ze-char-Ya-hu Zechariah הָרְבִעִ֑י <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I; the fourth כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בָּנִ֧ים <WH1121> ba-Nim all the sons וְאַחִ֛ים <WH251> ve-'a-Chim and brethren לְחֹסָ֖ה <WH2621> le-cho-Sah of Hosah שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah three עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לְ֠אֵלֶּה <WH428> Le-'el-leh to these מַחְלְק֨וֹת <WH4256> mach-le-Kot Among these [were] the divisions הַשֹּֽׁעֲרִ֜ים <WH7778> hash-sho-'a-Rim of the porters לְרָאשֵׁ֧י <WH7218> le-ra-Shei [even] among the chief הַגְּבָרִ֛ים <WH1397> hag-ge-va-Rim men מִשְׁמָר֖וֹת <WH4931> mish-ma-Rot [having] wards לְעֻמַּ֣ת <WH5980> le-'um-Mat one against אֲחֵיהֶ֑ם <WH251> 'a-chei-Hem; another לְשָׁרֵ֖ת <WH8334> le-sha-Ret to minister בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיַּפִּ֨ילוּ <WH5307> vai-yap-Pi-lu And they cast גוֹרָל֜וֹת <WH1486> go-ra-Lot lots כַּקָּטֹ֧ן <WH6996> kak-ka-Ton as well the small כַּגָּד֛וֹל <WH1419> kag-ga-Dol as the great לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> le-Veit according to the house אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> a-vo-Tam of their fathers לְשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> le-Sha-'ar for every gate וָשָֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> va-Sha-'ar. gate פ Peh

וַיִּפֹּ֧ל <WH5307> vai-yip-Pol fell הַגּוֹרָ֛ל <WH1486> hag-go-Ral And the lot מִזְרָ֖חָה <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah eastward לְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֑הוּ <WH8018> le-she-lem-Ya-hu; to Shelemiah וּזְכַרְיָ֨הוּ <WH2148> u-ze-char-Ya-hu Then for Zechariah בְנ֜וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son יוֹעֵ֣ץ׀ <WH3289> yo-'Etz counsellor בְּשֶׂ֗כֶל <WH7922> be-Se-chel, a wise הִפִּ֙ילוּ֙ <WH5307> hip-Pi-lu they cast גּֽוֹרָל֔וֹת <WH1486> go-ra-Lot, lots וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came out גוֹרָל֖וֹ <WH1486> go-ra-Lo and his lot צָפֽוֹנָה׃ <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah. northward ס sa-Mek

לְעֹבֵ֥ד le-'o-Ved אֱדֹ֖ם <WH5654> 'e-Dom To Obededom נֶ֑גְבָּה <WH5045> Neg-bah; southward וּלְבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> u-le-va-Nav and to his sons בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit the house הָאֲסֻפִּֽים׃ <WH624> ha-'a-sup-Pim. of Asuppim

לְשֻׁפִּ֤ים <WH8206> le-shup-Pim To Shuppim וּלְחֹסָה֙ <WH2621> u-le-cho-Sah and Hosah לַֽמַּעֲרָ֔ב <WH4628> lam-ma-'a-Rav, [the lot came forth] westward עִ֚ם <WH5973> 'im by שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar with the gate שַׁלֶּ֔כֶת <WH7996> shal-Le-chet, Shallecheth בַּֽמְסִלָּ֖ה <WH4546> bam-sil-Lah by the causeway הָעוֹלָ֑ה <WH5927> ha-'o-Lah; of the going up מִשְׁמָ֖ר <WH4929> mish-Mar ward לְעֻמַּ֥ת <WH5980> le-'um-Mat against מִשְׁמָֽר׃ <WH4929> mish-Mar. ward

לַמִּזְרָח֮ <WH4217> lam-miz-Rach Eastward הַלְוִיִּ֣ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim Levites שִׁשָּׁה֒ <WH8337> shish-Shah [were] six לַצָּפ֤וֹנָה <WH6828> latz-tza-Fo-nah northward לַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> lai-yOm a day אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah, four לַנֶּ֥גְבָּה <WH5045> lan-Neg-bah southward לַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> lai-Yom a day אַרְבָּעָ֑ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah; four וְלָאֲסֻפִּ֖ים <WH624> ve-la-'a-sup-Pim and toward Asuppim שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim two שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> she-Na-yim. [and] two

לַפַּרְבָּ֖ר <WH6503> lap-par-Bar At Parbar לַֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <WH4628> lam-ma-'a-Rav; westward אַרְבָּעָה֙ <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah four לַֽמְסִלָּ֔ה <WH4546> lam-sil-Lah, at the causeway שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim [and] two לַפַּרְבָּֽר׃ <WH6503> lap-par-Bar. at Parbar

אֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh, These מַחְלְקוֹת֙ <WH4256> mach-le-kOt These [are] the divisions הַשֹּׁ֣עֲרִ֔ים <WH7778> hash-Sho-'a-Rim, of the porters לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei among the sons הַקָּרְחִ֖י <WH7145> hak-ka-re-Chi of Kore וְלִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> ve-liv-Nei and among the sons מְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> me-ra-Ri. of Merari

וְֽהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim; And of the Levites אֲחִיָּ֗ה <WH281> 'a-chi-Yah, Ahijah עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- had charge אֽוֹצְרוֹת֙ <WH214> 'otz-rOt [was] over the treasures בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וּלְאֹֽצְר֖וֹת <WH214> u-le-'o-tze-Rot and over the treasures הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> hak-ko-da-Shim. of the dedicated things

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei [As concerning] the sons לַ֠עְדָּן <WH3936> La'-don of Laadan בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֜י <WH1649> hag-ge-re-shun-Ni of the Gershonite לְלַעְדָּ֗ן <WH3936> le-la'-Dan, Laadan רָאשֵׁ֧י <WH7218> ra-Shei chief הָאָב֛וֹת <WH1> ha-'a-Vot fathers לְלַעְדָּ֥ן <WH3936> le-la'-Dan [even] of Laadan הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֖י <WH1649> hag-ge-re-shun-Ni the Gershonite יְחִיאֵלִֽי׃ <WH3172> ye-chi-'e-Li. [were] Jehieli

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons יְחִֽיאֵלִ֑י <WH3172> ye-chi-'e-Li; of Jehieli זֵתָם֙ <WH2241> ze-Tam Zetham וְיוֹאֵ֣ל <WH3100> ve-yo-'El and Joel אָחִ֔יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv, his brother עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- had charge אֹצְר֖וֹת <WH214> o-tze-Rot [which were] over the treasures בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

לַֽעַמְרָמִי֙ <WH6020> la-'am-ra-Mi Of the Amramites לַיִּצְהָרִ֔י <WH3325> lai-yitz-ha-Ri, [and] the Izharites לַֽחֶבְרוֹנִ֖י <WH2276> la-chev-ro-Ni the Hebronites לָֽעָזִּיאֵלִֽי׃ <WH5817> La-'az-zi-'e-Li. [and] the Uzzielites

וּשְׁבֻאֵל֙ <WH7619> u-she-vu-'El And Shebuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son גֵּרְשׁ֣וֹם <WH1647> ge-re-Shom of Gershom בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, of Moses נָגִ֖יד <WH5057> na-Gid [was] ruler עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הָאֹצָרֽוֹת׃ <WH214> ha-'o-tza-Rot. of the treasures

וְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav And his brethren לֶֽאֱלִיעֶ֑זֶר <WH461> le-'e-li-'E-zer; by Eliezer רְחַבְיָ֨הוּ <WH7345> re-chav-Ya-hu Rehabiah בְנ֜וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son וִֽישַׁעְיָ֤הוּ <WH3470> vi-sha'-Ya-hu and Jeshaiah בְנוֹ֙ <WH1121> ve-No his son וְיֹרָ֣ם <WH3141> ve-yo-Ram and Joram בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> be-No, his son וְזִכְרִ֥י <WH2147> ve-zich-Ri and Zichri בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son; וּשְׁלֹמֹות u-she-lo-mot כוּשְׁלֹמִ֥ית <WH8013> u-she-lo-Mit Shelomith קבְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. his son
